about.heading: About me
about.subheading: Find out who I am, my current programming skills, and the projects I have completed.
about.title: Meet me !

details.para1: As a passionate developer, I specialize in creating modern and functate developernal software. Check out my achievements in the Projects section.
details.para2: I like to share my acquired knowledge in development in order to help the developer community. Feel free to follow me on Linkedin and Instagram for more content.
details.para3: I am open to professional opportunities. If you have an offer that matches my skills, contact me.

projects.heading: Projects
projects.subheading: Discover a selection of personal and academic projects that I have carried out.
projects.galaxyRushContent: Galaxy Rush is a WPF game that I created with my team, in C# on Visual Studio. This project was carried out during my first year of BUT Informatique.
projects.phaserContent: Here are several games running on the web, developed in JavaScript using the framework Phaser.
projects.kubeContent: Kube is a game made via Unity in C#. It is a minimalist style platform game with several worlds and levels.
projects.botanicContent: Botanic est un logiciel créé en C# lié à une base de données relationnelle. L'application a été créée pour la création de commandes et de produits pour une entreprise de décoration.
projects.scodocContent: ScoDoc is a free software created to track the education of university students. This project focuses on the creation and visualization of data created from scratch.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.subheading: Do you have a question or a project? Do not hesitate to contact me, I will give you an answer as soon as possible.
